% Packages
\usepackage{amsmath,amssymb}
\usepackage[scaled]{helvet}
\renewcommand\familydefault{\sfdefault} 
\usepackage{sfmath}
\usetikzlibrary{shapes.geometric, arrows.meta, calc, decorations.pathmorphing}

% Font sizes
\newcommand{\tinySize}{\tiny}			% tiny corresponds to 6 pt
\newcommand{\textSize}{\scriptsize}		% scriptsize corresponds to 8 pt
\newcommand{\headingSize}{\small}		% small corresponds to 10 pt
\newcommand{\labelSize}{\large}			% Large corresponds to 12 pt and bf for bold face

% Figure labels
\newcommand{\figLabel}[1]{\labelSize\textbf{\MakeLowercase{#1}}}

% Figure section headings
\newcommand{\figHeading}[1]{\headingSize \MakeUppercase{#1}}

% Roman numerals
\newcommand{\RomanNumeralCaps}[1]{\MakeUppercase{\romannumeral #1}}

% Colors
\definecolor{exampleHTML}{HTML}{DC3912}
\definecolor{exampleRGB}{rgb}{0.8500, 0.3250, 0.0980}

% Custom commands
\newcommand{\unit}{1mm}
\newcommand{\arrow}{{Latex[length=2*\unit, width=4*\unit]}}
\newcommand{\lineWidth}{1pt}

% Styles
\tikzstyle{panel}=[draw=none, inner sep=0, outer sep=0]
\tikzstyle{label}=[draw=none, anchor=north west, text height = 10pt, text depth=5pt, inner sep=0, outer sep=0, xshift=2mm, yshift=1mm]
\tikzstyle{lines}=[draw=black, line width=\lineWidth, rounded corners=1mm]
\tikzstyle{lineShort}=[lines, shorten > =3mm]
\tikzstyle{boldArrow}=[draw=black, -\arrow, line width=2*\lineWidth]
\tikzstyle{boldArrowShort}=[shorten > =3mm, shorten < =3mm]
\tikzstyle{headingNode}=[draw=none, inner sep=1mm, text height=7pt, text depth=1pt, fill=none]
\tikzstyle{textNode}=[draw=none, inner sep=1mm]
\tikzstyle{labelNode}=[inner sep=0, outer sep=0, anchor=north east, xshift=7mm, yshift=-2mm]
